definition: surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

pinyin: Ji2 er3 bo2 te4 Qun2 dao3

sentences.english: And this brings us to a very famous contribution of Gilbert ryle.
sentences.chinese: 吉尔伯特的著名贡献刚好说明了这一论点。

sentences.english: Have fun watching a humorous cameo by comedian Gilbert Gottfried.
sentences.chinese: 乐趣观看喜剧演员吉尔伯特戈特弗里德幽默客串。

sentences.english: A Mr. Gilbert phoned and left a message for you.
sentences.chinese: 一位姓吉尔伯特的先生给您打来电话并留了言。

sentences.english: Mr. Gilbert phoned and left a message for you.
sentences.chinese: 一位姓吉尔伯特的先生给您打来电话并留了言。

sentences.english: The American forces seized the Gilbert Island Atoll from the Japanese. (AP Photo)
sentences.chinese: 美军从日本人手中夺取了吉尔伯特岛的这处环礁。

sentences.english: Gilbert excoriated him for trying to play with perfection.
sentences.chinese: 吉尔伯特训斥他总是追求完美。

sentences.english: The lieutenant appeared at the top of the gangplank , holding Gilbert in his arms.
sentences.chinese: 中尉来到了跳板上，挽着吉尔伯特的胳膊。

sentences.english: As we said goodnight, Gilbert took my hand.
sentences.chinese: 当我说晚安时，吉尔伯特抓住我的手。

sentences.english: The lieutenant appeared at the top of the gangplank, holding Gilbert in his arms.
sentences.chinese: 父亲出现在跳板处，抓住吉尔伯特的手臂。

sentences.english: Sir Humphrey Gilbert led the first English settlement efforts.
sentences.chinese: 杭佛瑞？吉尔伯特领导第一批英国殖民者去了那里。

sentences.english: This man was Gilbert Jensen, whom she remembered as the medic from the Philippines.
sentences.chinese: 这名男子詹森吉尔伯特人，她记住作为苜来自菲律宾。

sentences.english: When Johnson oversaw construction projects in the camp, Gilbert tagged along.
sentences.chinese: 当约翰森在营地监督建筑工程时，吉尔伯特紧随其后。

sentences.english: Was he ashamed that he hadn't fulfilled his promise? And why hadn't I helped Dad find Gilbert before he died?
sentences.chinese: 是他没有兑现承诺所以觉得愧对吉尔伯特？

sentences.english: Why did not you ask the Gilberts to come to us today?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么今天不请吉尔伯特夫妇来？

sentences.english: I knew he had tried to adopt Gilbert and bring him home.
sentences.chinese: 我知道他曾试图领养吉尔伯特并将他带回家。

definition: Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
Roth (name)/Kenneth Roth (1955-), executive director of Human Rights Watch 人權觀察|人权观察[Ren2 quan2 Guan1 cha2]
McMillan or MacMillan (name)/Harold Macmillan (1894-1986), UK conservative politician, prime minister 1957-1963
